message.subject: Conference Calls
message.content:
M1.1. Please review and set up a meeting with me to establish a plan for this
committee. [Y]
[Request-Action: review presumably attached document and set up a meeting with Mark Haedicke]
Flink1.1
M1.2. Mark
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Conference Calls
message.content:
M2.1. Stacy and Ruth:
[Conventional: salutation]
M2.2. I propose the following agenda for the NA energy committee:
[Inform: following is proposal of agenda for NA energy committee]
M2.3. 1. convergence of commodity forms -- need to build a team to pursue this
M2.4. 2. California energy issues/solutions
M2.5. 3. standardized provisions for master energy contracts -- setoff, netting,
termination, etc.
M2.6. 4. bankruptcy
M2.7. 5. CFTC study of retail derivatives
M2.8. 6. emerging market forms for paper, steel, etc.
[Inform: list of 6 items that Mark Haedicke would like to be the agenda]
M2.9. Mark Taylor will send a list of proposed topics for the European conference.
[Inform: Mark Taylor will send a list of proposed topics for European conference]
M2.10. Let me know what you think.
[Request-Information: Stacy and Ruth's thoughts]
Flink2.10
M2.11. Regards,
[Conventional: beginning of signature]

message.subject: Conference Calls
message.content:
[DUPLICATE OF MESSAGE 1]
M3.1. Please review and set up a meeting with me to establish a plan for this
committee.
[Request-Action: review presumably attached document and set up a meeting with Mark Haedicke]
Flink3.1
M3.2. Mark
[Conventional: signature]
